name: Element_prependChildTest
description: Unit tests for the prependChild method of the Element class.

test_cases.name: testPrependChild
test_cases.description: Tests the prependChild method by adding a child node and verifying its position.

test_cases.name: testPrependChildNull
test_cases.description: Tests the prependChild method's handling of null input, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
